entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High 26. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
